Container.Name: EPlusTV
Container.Overview:
This takes ESPN+ and transforms it into a "live TV" experience with virtual linear channels. It will discover what is on, and generate a schedule of channels that will give you M3U and XMLTV files that you can import into something like Jellyfin or VLC.
=== Notes === * This was not made for pirating streams. This is made for using your own credentials and have a different presentation than the ESPN+ app currently gives. * There are some questions about how boundies work when a scheduled entry ends or when a new entry starts if it will pick it up automatically. * The Mouse might not like it and it could be taken down at any minute. Enjoy it while it lasts. ¯\\(ツ)/¯
